message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth a lot to us, but we're confident it will be just as valuable to you. We're willing to let you have it for $95. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I must maintain our minimum price. I am willing to negotiate further, so I propose an offer of $85 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your financial considerations.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. I'd love to get a good deal on this product, and I'm confident we can work something out.

I see your point, Bob. I'm glad you're willing to compromise. Considering our costs and the value of the product, I think a fair price would be $82. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still trying to get the best deal I can. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I think $75 is the most I'm willing to pay. I'd love to hear if you can meet me at this price.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budget constraints. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach a mutual agreement at $78. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive for both of us. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $75. I think this is the best price we can both agree on. I'm willing to make a firm offer at $75, and I'd like to hear if you can accept it.

Considering our previous discussions and the value of the product, I believe we can come to an agreement at $76. This price respects your budget while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. I hope you'll find this proposal acceptable.

Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial price, but I'm still not willing to go above $75. I think this is the best price we can both agree on. I'm making a final offer at $75, and I hope you'll accept it.
